snippet: A deeper look at the role of science in fostering human progress.
abstract: A deeper look at the role of science in fostering human progress.
lead_paragraph: Thomas M. Lessl, a scholar at the University of Georgia who has long studied the rhetoric and societal relationships of both science and religion, is well positioned to add to the recent discussion here over whether confidence in science as a source of progress is based on faith or fact.

headline.main: Science, Faith and Progress (With and Without a Capital 'P')
